categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you’re staying in a hotel and need to iron your clothes, send the first few puffs of steam into a towel.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: It may have been a while since the last time the iron was used, and the steam holes may be filled with nasty brown mineral deposits which you don’t want heat-blasted into your clothes.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Whenever you travel abroad bring a new soundtrack for each place you visit, preferably one you have never heard before.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: In the future, every time you listen to each soundtrack again they will bring you vivid memories of the places you have visited.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: When flying, put a tag with your info inside your bag, not just outside.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Any tag on the outside can come off. Also, when a bag gets lost, the airline will open it to try to determine who it belongs to.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Before traveling anywhere, always download an offline map of the area.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: It will save you a ton of nerves in case the wi-fi is weak or you can’t buy local SIM at the airport or upfront.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you’re planning a camping trip or a national park trip or anything of that nature, check the moon cycles and try to go during the new moon phase.
When traveling with a friend or family member, don’t be afraid to suggest breaking off to each do your own things for a day.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Going solo can be enjoyable (eat/go wherever want at your own pace), plus it reduces you being sick of each other by the end of the trip.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: When traveling with a friend or family member, don’t be afraid to suggest breaking off to each do your own things for a day.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Going solo can be enjoyable (eat/go wherever want at your own pace), plus it reduces you being sick of each other by the end of the trip.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you ever find yourself stranded in the middle of nowhere, stay with your vehicle.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: You are much more likely to be found by searchers and will have shelter if needed.
